channel.title: UML on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in UML on Machine Learning

item.title: PlantUML
item.description: Intro # PlantUML is a convinient tool to make diagrams using UML language/format, such as sequence diagrams, use cases, flow diagrams etc. pic-ref Selected Tools # Live preview in Visual Studio VSCode plugins: jebbs.plantuml w/ encoded url. (Tip1: render by either local (suggested, needs java+graphviz) or server. Tip2: config “server” as the bold part of: http://www.plantuml.com/plantuml/uml/xxxyyyzzz) A site that can support PNG, SVG, ASCII/TXT, save/generate encoded url (“Edit” button), and have many examples: PlantText.
